secured.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a secured loan, debt etc is protected by an agreement that if it is not paid, the borrower must give the lender certain assets, such as property or shares
secured.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Secured credit cards are backed by a deposit that a consumer must make with the card issuer.
The secured debentures will mature on Jan. 15,2006.
secured.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who lends money, with an agreement that if the debt is not paid, the borrower has to give the lender certain assets, such as property or shares
secured.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The company’s secured lender foreclosed on the company’s assets last week.
